node.excerpt: 2016-2020 In 2019 I was appointed director for The International Edvard Grieg Piano Competition, and together with the established project…

frontmatter.title: The Intl. Edvard Grieg Piano Competition
frontmatter.respons: A biennial event hosted by KODE Edvard Grieg Museum Troldhaugen. 30 international classical pianists and 10 days of concerts and events.

node.excerpt: 30 hours of live national TV The idea of producing a live TV-broadcast of Edvard Grieg's complete musical production had circulated in the…

frontmatter.title: Grieg Minute by Minute
frontmatter.respons: 30 hour live TV-production. 600+ musicians, national broadcast and 700.000 viewers.

node.excerpt: Event coordination, logistics, speech proposals and VIP-guestlist In 2017, KODE reopened one of it's museum buildings in the heart of Bergen…

frontmatter.title: Reopening KODE 1
frontmatter.respons: 1500 opening day visitors. The Queen, Prime Minister, Minister of Trade and Mayer of Bergen present. VIP-guestlist and logistics.
